en.title: Overtime Pay Calculator
en.seoTitle: Overtime Pay Calculator - Calculate Overtime Wages & Extra Pay
en.metaDescription: Calculate your overtime pay and total earnings including regular and overtime hours. Free overtime calculator for hours worked over 40 per week.
en.summary: Calculate overtime pay for hours worked over 40 per week.
en.description: Calculate your overtime pay based on hours worked beyond the standard 40-hour workweek. Includes calculations for different overtime multipliers (1.5x, 2x) and shows total earnings including regular and overtime pay.
instructions: Specify total hours worked in the week
Choose overtime multiplier (usually 1.5x for overtime, 2x for double time)
View your overtime pay breakdown and total earnings
en.formula:
Regular Hours = min(40, Total Hours)
Overtime Hours = max(0, Total Hours - 40)
Overtime Rate = Regular Rate × Multiplier
Overtime Pay = Overtime Hours × Overtime Rate
Total Pay = (Regular Hours × Regular Rate) + Overtime Pay

seoContent.introduction: Calculate your overtime pay quickly and accurately with our free Overtime Pay Calculator. Whether you're tracking your weekly earnings or planning your work schedule, understanding overtime pay is essential for proper compensation.
benefits: Calculate overtime pay for any number of extra hours
Support for different overtime multipliers (1.5x, 2x)
Clear breakdown of regular vs overtime pay
Help ensure you're paid correctly for extra work
Plan earnings based on expected work hours
howToUse: Enter your regular hourly wage rate
Input the total number of hours you worked in the week
Review your pay breakdown showing regular and overtime amounts
seoContent.formulaExplanation: Overtime pay is calculated using the FLSA standard: Hours 1-40 are paid at regular rate, hours over 40 are paid at regular rate × overtime multiplier.
seoContent.whoShouldUse: Hourly employees, payroll managers, anyone working overtime hours, workers wanting to understand their overtime pay.
seoContent.importantNotes: Overtime rules may vary by country and industry. This calculator follows standard FLSA guidelines where overtime is 1.5x regular rate for hours over 40 per week.

es.seoTitle: Calculadora de Pago de Horas Extras - Calcula Salarios por Horas Extras y Pago Extra
es.metaDescription: Calcula tu pago de horas extras y ganancias totales incluyendo horas regulares y extras. Calculadora gratuita de horas extras para horas trabajadas sobre 40 por semana.
es.summary: Calcula pago de horas extras para horas trabajadas sobre 40 por semana.
es.description: Calcula tu pago de horas extras basado en horas trabajadas más allá de la semana laboral estándar de 40 horas. Incluye cálculos para diferentes multiplicadores de horas extras (1.5x, 2x) y muestra ganancias totales incluyendo pago regular y de horas extras.
instructions: Ingresa tu tarifa por hora regular
Especifica total de horas trabajadas en la semana
Elige multiplicador de horas extras (usualmente 1.5x para horas extras, 2x para tiempo doble)
Ve tu desglose de pago de horas extras y ganancias totales
es.formula:
Horas Regulares = mín(40, Horas Totales)
Horas Extras = máx(0, Horas Totales - 40)
Tarifa Horas Extras = Tarifa Regular × Multiplicador
Pago Horas Extras = Horas Extras × Tarifa Horas Extras
Pago Total = (Horas Regulares × Tarifa Regular) + Pago Horas Extras
